params.txn: A `Transfer.Transaction` struct TODO: Add support for an OTHER Asset type and do a (to, value, data) CALL

meetsTerms(Transfer.Transaction,Transfer.return: A boolean indicating if the terms are met

devdoc.title: Transfer - A library to encode a generic asset transfer data type

execute(Transfer.Transaction).notice: A delegate target for executing transfers of an arbitrary Transfer.Detail

meetsTerms(Transfer.Transaction,Transfer.notice: Verifies whether or not a `Transfer.Transaction` meets the terms set by a `Transfer.Terms` object based on the limit information of how much can be transferred

userdoc.notice: This library defines `Transfer.Transaction` and `Transfer.Terms`, two structures which are used in state channel applications to represent a kind of "resolution" and a commitment to how much can be resolved respectively. A `Transfer.Transaction` object should be able to encode any arbitrary Ethereum-based asset transfer.
